oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Venus Theatre
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: arts; entertainment; music; theaters; vaudeville; Venus Theatre; 1920s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Venus, a vaudeville theater, at 336 Beale Street. According to the 1924 city directory, the proprietor was Anselmo Barrasso. In 1919, this property was listed as the Metropolitan Theatre.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
